cab.content: 3SECRET.BATTLE SITUATION - EVENING - 4th SEPTEMBER, 1918.1" WESTERN FRONT...m British Front, On the battle front of the 1st and 3rd Armies our troops are on the canal bank at HANANCOURT and ETRICOURT and are in the western outskirts of WEUVILLE-BOBRJONVTLLE and in the north western part of HAVEINCOURT WOOD.The 63rd Division were in MOUEVRES at 12 noon.The enemy hold the lock east of INCHY and forced our patrols to withdraw from there slightly, Further North the enemy hold the banks of the canal strongly and at PALLUEL hold the bridge-head.North of the IiA BASSES CANAL our patrols have pushed out towards CANTBLAUX and CHATEAU ST. ROCH.(b) French Front. The French have-crossed the VESLE north-west of FISMES and have batteries on the north side of the river *-2t ITALIAN AND MACEDONIAN FRONTS.There is nothing to report BGeneral Staff,War Office, S.W.I.4th September, 1918. Issued at 6.45 p.m.
